user_course_search.TITLE: User tokens are used when searching for courses. For Client Users this will enable them to see Organisation specific Courses.

client_course_filter.TITLE: Add Course Selector to swap between Organisation and public courses. Note: Should only be enabled for Client User Configs

add_course_selector.TITLE: Adds Course Selectors to the Course List - allowing other courses to be selected.

location_filter.TITLE: Adds a Location Filter to the course search, when searching by Workshop.

training_category.TITLE: Filter all Course Searches by a training category.

venue_restriction.TITLE:
Filter all (Workshop) Course Searches to a single Venue.
NOTE: Uses Venue Contact ID - not Name

location_restriction.TITLE: Filter all (Workshop) Course Searches to a single Location

delivery_location_restriction.TITLE:
Filter all (Program) Course Searches to a single Delivery Location.
NOTE: Uses Delivery Location ID - not Name

domain_filter.TITLE:
Filter course search results by domain.

Supply multiple domains as comma separated list, without spaces.

Note: Switch inclusive/exclusive through the other settings.

domain_filter_exclude.TITLE: Switch the domain filter between including filtered domains, or excluding them.

show_no_domain.TITLE: Show or hide courses which have no linked domain from the course instance search results.
